TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISecurityCapabilities

summary.span: 定義用來指定繫結之安全性功能的合約。

span.span: Defines the contract for specifying the security capabilities for bindings.

remarks.format: ## Examples 如需完整實作，請參閱[NetHttpBinding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f2bb9b2-e0c5-4e8e-a9d3-703575bb159c)範例For a full implementation see the [NetHttpBinding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f2bb9b2-e0c5-4e8e-a9d3-703575bb159c) sample
